long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn Your Ugly URLs Into Smart Links.   flyer.social allows you share and track your links using powerful analytics integrations.  You'll be able to catch the website you are visiting and create a special smart link.

For the unlimited version, Join for free!

For Social Media Influencers, Freelancers, Consultants, Digital Nomads, and Lifestyle Entrepreneurs.

If you make a living online you'll want to use flyer.social to share portfolios, proposals, and other files. 
 TRACK every image, video, and article you post.  GET PAID for shout outs, sponsorships, gigs, jobs, & donations with our "Buy" Links.  TEST business ideas, posts ideas, or track affiliate products. RETARGET prospects with Facebook Pixel and Google Analytic embedded links.

A Powerful Tool to Supercharge Your Profits!

Easy Link Manager => Generate links in seconds and share them anywhere online. Edit, Share, and Track!

Dynamic Tracking => Add Google Analytics, UTM, and Facebook Pixel for in-dept tracking and retargeting.

Unlimited Visitors => No restrictions on visitors nor bandwidth. Track as many as you like!

Sell Goods & Services => Get paid easily with PayPal and/or Stripe. No Additional fees per transaction. Pay only processor fees.

Free Ebooks & E-Guides => Learn the most profitable online tactics to thrive online!

Free Chrome Extension => Easily create links on the web pages you visit to share and track. Coming Soon!
